question: What is my obligations towards wife and father at this moment and in this situation.
answer:
QUESTION

I am really thankful to you on advising me almost with full detail, however, I have following concerns related to this issue:

1. I have a little 8 years old daughter, she was born after almost more than three years of that incident.

2. I really love my wife, who is also my cousin (daughter of my mother's sister)

3. From your answer it revealed that our Nikkah is Haram and we were no more husband and wife since that incident.

4. What is the sin of my wife, while it was totally from my father.

5. What is my obligations towards wife and father at this moment and in this situation.

6. Please help me ! I am in great trouble as I have to save my faith and this world also.

Waiting for your detail guidance in view of above facts.

ANSWER


Share:

It is my humble opinion you refer your matter to your local Ulama as there are some issues of incest which have to be viewed closely. Tell us where you are based in Pakistan and we could suggest who you could see. Also tell us who you generally refer to or meet.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
